abstract: Facebook will sell stock in a initial public offering when the time is right, its chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, said in an interview, Reuters reported.
snippet: Facebook will sell stock in a initial public offering when the time is right, its chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, said in an interview, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Facebook will sell stock in a initial public offering when the time is right, its chief executive, Mark Zuckerberg, said in an ABC-TV interview, Reuters reported.

headline.main: A Facebook I.P.O.? When It ‘Makes Sense,’ Zuckerberg Says
